Liono: ::As the preds react to the image the real Liono creeps into the 
doorway as the main chamber defenses come online the Autoguns sweep the room 
getting a back attack on all preds in the chamber while Liono aims a cannon 
and sweep the Room with a Rapid Fire pulse cannon:: 

Tigerhawk: ::creeps towards the room:: that will hold the others but ::Aims 
weird looking gun at rampage and Fires 3 Seeker missile with pure energon 
tipped war heads at rampage:: Looks like you just got boiled. 

::as Liono and Tigerhawk roll in to cover on both sides of the door::
